dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare to approach the shadows, mortal?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am not afraid of shadows. Who are you?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hah, bravery or foolishness? I am a Dusk Revenant, a wraith of the shadows.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: What do you seek in these shadows?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: I seek only darkness and chaos. What drives you forward, human?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek knowledge. Can we not coexist in the shadows?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge is meaningless in the realm of shadows. Your presence disturbs our peace.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand the allure of chaos. Let us embrace it together.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You speak of understanding, yet you are blind to the true essence of chaos. Leave, before I show you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am just passing through. No need for hostility.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Mortals always think they can wander through our domain unscathed. You are mistaken.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for intruding. I will leave you in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies won't save you now. The shadows hunger for your essence.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not back down. Face me if you dare.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words for one who treads on the edge of oblivion. Prepare for oblivion.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I did not mean to disturb. I can leave if you prefer.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Leaving or staying, the result is the same. The shadows will consume you either way.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will take my leave then. Farewell, shadow creature.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Farewell, mortal. You are wise to retreat from the darkness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I refuse to be chased away. I will stand my ground.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stubbornness will lead you to your demise. Prepare for the shadows to claim you.
